subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Winning shots by Ohio State’s Aaron Croft and LaQuinton Ross in the final seconds of back-to-back games have put both players on the list of N.C.A.A. magic makers.
snippet: Winning shots by Ohio State’s Aaron Croft and LaQuinton Ross in the final seconds of back-to-back games have put both players on the list of N.C.A.A. magic makers.
